them,"},{"lineNumber":79754,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いずれは突破されるかと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"　eventually they will break through...\""},{"lineNumber":79755,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":79756,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ら、ランス様……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"L-Lance-sama...\""},{"lineNumber":79757,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちっ、仕方ないな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch, it can't be helped."},{"lineNumber":79758,"originalJapaneseLine":"　出るぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"　We're going battlefield."},{"lineNumber":79766,"originalJapaneseLine":"一騎当千の部隊ではあるが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Though it was a unit of unmatched foes."},{"lineNumber":79768,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは、戦場に投入して","translatedEnglishLine":"It was not a force capable of turning the tide"},{"lineNumber":79769,"originalJapaneseLine":"現状を引っ繰り返すたぐいの力ではない。","translatedEnglishLine":"on the battlefield by its mere presence."},{"lineNumber":79770,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、今の人類軍は","translatedEnglishLine":"However, the current human army"},{"lineNumber":79771,"originalJapaneseLine":"それに賭けるしかないのも真実だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"had no choice but to bet everything on them."},{"lineNumber":79772,"originalJapaneseLine":"――その行軍の最中に悲劇は起こった。","translatedEnglishLine":"—During their march, tragedy struck."},{"lineNumber":79773,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達が織田城を発って、","translatedEnglishLine":"After Lance and his group left Oda Castle,"},{"lineNumber":79774,"originalJapaneseLine":"たった一日の間に、","translatedEnglishLine":"within just one day,"},{"lineNumber":79775,"originalJapaneseLine":"別の勢力により織田城が攻め落とされた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Oda Castle was stormed and captured by another force."},{"lineNumber":79776,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はははは！　犯せ犯せー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hahaha! Rape them! Rape them!\""},

{"lineNumber":79777,"originalJapaneseLine":"「奪えー！　殺しまくれー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Take them! Kill them all!\""},{"lineNumber":79778,"originalJapaneseLine":"　はーっはははは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"　Ha ha ha ha ha!\""},{"lineNumber":79779,"originalJapaneseLine":"別の勢力――妖怪軍である。","translatedEnglishLine":"The other force was the Youkai army."},{"lineNumber":79780,"originalJapaneseLine":"二代目妖怪王、狂星九尾・末知女殿-ﾏﾁｼﾞｮﾃﾝ-。","translatedEnglishLine":"The second Youkai King, the Mad Star Nine-Tails, Lady Machijoten."},{"lineNumber":79781,"originalJapaneseLine":"三代目妖怪王、独眼流政宗。","translatedEnglishLine":"The third Youkai King, Dokuganryu Masamune."},

{"lineNumber":79782,"originalJapaneseLine":"両者の不在を知った、","translatedEnglishLine":"Knowing that both were absent,"},

{"lineNumber":79783,"originalJapaneseLine":"政宗と袂を分かっていた妖怪達が暴走。","translatedEnglishLine":"the Youkai who had parted ways with Masamune ran amok."},

{"lineNumber":79784,"originalJapaneseLine":"急造で軍を作り上げ、人里を襲いだした。","translatedEnglishLine":"They hastily formed an army and began attacking human settlements."},

{"lineNumber":79785,"originalJapaneseLine":"兵数は決して多くない、","translatedEnglishLine":"Their numbers were not large,"},

{"lineNumber":79786,"originalJapaneseLine":"侵略というより暴動と言えるものであったが、","translatedEnglishLine":"and their actions could be called riots rather than an invasion,"},

{"lineNumber":79787,"originalJapaneseLine":"緊急時であった織田城の守りは薄い。","translatedEnglishLine":"but Oda Castle’s defenses were thin in this emergency."},

{"lineNumber":79788,"originalJapaneseLine":"結果、大した抵抗も出来ずに、","translatedEnglishLine":"As a result, they could offer little resistance,"},

{"lineNumber":79789,"originalJapaneseLine":"織田城は落とされてしまった。","translatedEnglishLine":"and Oda Castle was taken."},

{"lineNumber":79790,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なにーーーー！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What---!?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「加えて、独眼流政宗様が戦場で討たれ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Additionally, Lord Masamune Dokuganryu was killed on the battlefield,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現在は本来の姿である刀に戻っています」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He has now returned to his original form as a sword."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「政宗様の奥方であった、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lady Masamune's wife,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 方位護天の皆様も同様に……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: as well as all the members of Houi Goten are the same..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「現在は残ったJAPAN軍で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Currently, the remaining JAPAN forces are,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとか防衛ラインを後退させていますが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: somehow retreating the defense line, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここもいずれ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This place too will eventually..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら、どうにか防衛しろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, defend it by any means necessary."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「残念ながら、それは不可能、です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Unfortunately, that is impossible."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほんのしばらくの間は大丈夫でしょうが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It might be alright for just a little while,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼我-ﾋｶﾞ-の戦力差を考えれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: considering the difference in forces between us and them,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いずれは突破されるかと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: eventually they will break through..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ら、ランス様……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "L-Lance-sama..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちっ、仕方ないな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, it can't be helped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出るぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We're going out."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、出るって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh, going out...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔軍は敵。敵はやっつける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The demon army is the enemy. We defeat the enemy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 天満橋を突破されたってんなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If they breached Tenma Bridge,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう一回押し戻すだけだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then we just push them back once more."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうして、ランスの率いる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thus, the demon subjugation squad led by Lance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人討伐隊が防衛ラインに向かい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: headed for the defense line,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場に参加することとなった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and joined the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一騎当千の部隊ではあるが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though it was a unit of unmatched warriors,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元々は強敵と戦う為の少数精鋭部隊である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was originally a small elite unit meant to fight formidable foes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは、戦場に投入して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was not a force capable of turning the tide

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現状を引っ繰り返すたぐいの力ではない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: on the battlefield by its mere presence.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、今の人類軍は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, the current human army

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに賭けるしかないのも真実だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: had no choice but to bet everything on them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――その行軍の最中に悲劇は起こった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —During their march, tragedy struck.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達が織田城を発って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After Lance and his group left Oda Castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たった一日の間に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: within just one day,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別の勢力により織田城が攻め落とされた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oda Castle was stormed and captured by another force.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はははは！　犯せ犯せー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha! Rape them! Rape them!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「奪えー！　殺しまくれー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Take them! Kill them all!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はーっはははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ha ha ha ha ha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別の勢力――妖怪軍である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The other force was the Youkai army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二代目妖怪王、狂星九尾・末知女殿-ﾏﾁｼﾞｮﾃﾝ-。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The second Youkai King, the Mad Star Nine-Tails, Lady Machijoten.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 三代目妖怪王、独眼流政宗。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The third Youkai King, Dokuganryu Masamune.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両者の不在を知った、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Knowing that both were absent,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 政宗と袂を分かっていた妖怪達が暴走。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Youkai who had parted ways with Masamune ran amok.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 急造で軍を作り上げ、人里を襲いだした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They hastily formed an army and began attacking human settlements.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵数は決して多くない、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Their numbers were not large,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 侵略というより暴動と言えるものであったが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and their actions could be called riots rather than an invasion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 緊急時であった織田城の守りは薄い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Oda Castle’s defenses were thin in this emergency.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結果、大した抵抗も出来ずに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As a result, they could offer little resistance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 織田城は落とされてしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Oda Castle was taken.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なにーーーー！？

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら、どうにか防衛しろ」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほんのしばらくの間は大丈夫でしょうが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It might be alright for just a little while,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼我-ﾋｶﾞ-の戦力差を考えれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: considering the difference in forces between us and them,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いずれは突破されるかと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: eventually they will break through..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ら、ランス様……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "L-Lance-sama..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちっ、仕方ないな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, it can't be helped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出るぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We're going out."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、出るって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh, going out...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔軍は敵。敵はやっつける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The demon army is the enemy. We defeat the enemy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 天満橋を突破されたってんなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If they breached Tenma Bridge,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう一回押し戻すだけだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then we just push them back once more."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうして、ランスの率いる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thus, the demon subjugation squad led by Lance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人討伐隊が防衛ラインに向かい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: headed for the defense line,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場に参加することとなった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and joined the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一騎当千の部隊ではあるが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though it was a unit of unmatched warriors,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元々は強敵と戦う為の少数精鋭部隊である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was originally a small elite unit meant to fight formidable foes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは、戦場に投入して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was not a force capable of turning the tide

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現状を引っ繰り返すたぐいの力ではない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: on the battlefield by its mere presence.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、今の人類軍は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, the current human army

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに賭けるしかないのも真実だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: had no choice but to bet everything on them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――その行軍の最中に悲劇は起こった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —During their march, tragedy struck.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達が織田城を発って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After Lance and his group left Oda Castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たった一日の間に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: within just one day,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別の勢力により織田城が攻め落とされた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oda Castle was stormed and captured by another force.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はははは！　犯せ犯せー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha! Rape them! Rape them!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「奪えー！　殺しまくれー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Take them! Kill them all!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はーっはははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ha ha ha ha ha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別の勢力――妖怪軍である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The other force was the Youkai army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二代目妖怪王、狂星九尾・末知女殿-ﾏﾁｼﾞｮﾃﾝ-。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The second Youkai King, the Mad Star Nine-Tails, Lady Machijoten.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 三代目妖怪王、独眼流政宗。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The third Youkai King, Dokuganryu Masamune.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両者の不在を知った、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Knowing that both were absent,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 政宗と袂を分かっていた妖怪達が暴走。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Youkai who had parted ways with Masamune ran amok.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 急造で軍を作り上げ、人里を襲いだした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They hastily formed an army and began attacking human settlements.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵数は決して多くない、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Their numbers were not large,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 侵略というより暴動と言えるものであったが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and their actions could be called riots rather than an invasion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 緊急時であった織田城の守りは薄い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Oda Castle’s defenses were thin in this emergency.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結果、大した抵抗も出来ずに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As a result, they could offer little resistance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 織田城は落とされてしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Oda Castle was taken.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なにーーーー！？
